description: With the 24hr pass you can ride 2hrs before having to dock.  Remember as long as you dock every 2hrs your membership is only $8.  If you go over 2hrs you will incur usage fees.
name: 24-Hour Pass

description: The price shown is per month. Save $20 when you purchase an entire year of rides with Charlotte Bcycle. Enjoy unlimited 120 minute rides. Don't forget to dock every 2 hours to avoid usage fees.
name: Annual Membership Monthly

description: Enjoy unlimited 120-minutes rides for a month! Rides longer than 2 hours are subject to a usage fee of $4 per additional 30 minutes. Don't forget to dock every 2 hours, in order to avoid usage fees.
name: Monthly - Regular
